attributes.action: request the Parlimentary and Health Service Ombudsman (PHSO) and the Departmentment of Health to apply the Cabinet Office Statement of Practice on Staff Transfer in the Public Sector to ensure that current Healthcare Commission Complaints function staff are transferred to the PHSO and not left without jobs in these difficult times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament, which the PHSO reports to.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
